# Unit 10: Optimization Problems

EVT in single variable:

This is pretty obvious ^.


![4a27e260.png](4a27e260-kl2ssw88.png)

![351f0e59.png](351f0e59-kl2ssw88.png)

The set of all boundary points is called the **boundary**.

A set is said to be closed if it contains all of its boundary points.
